Work Experiences

A brief info and past experiences

BIO

I'm a 2nd-year Software Engineering bachelor, who is currently exploring roles that will guide me to become ardently versatile in the realm of software development or in Venture Capital. My areas of interest are Product management/ analysis, Fintech, AI, ML, Blockchain, & Backend development. I have a good knowledge of technology and in focus of how AI & ML are changing the landscape (application wise as well), also Renewable energy (Hydrogen, Ammonia, CCS). Having been born to a family of entrepreneurs, and worked on a profusuion of startups has resulted in this desire of Entrepreneurship to be forged into me, I have therefore developed a knack for deciphering at an early stage the kind of businesses that work and are succesful, and hence have decided to work in the field of Venture Capital. I would like to gain more experience and knowledge with the same grit but with a passion upon given opportunities and possibilities.

11Point2

Engineering Intern

Got the opportunity to be involved with two major projects valued at over $500 million focusing on engineering and economics. my experience encompassed renewable energy, carbon emissions, and manufacturing processes, resulting in valuable research outputs and insights into successful business operations. This opportunity helped me in developing a newfound interest in renewable energy and trading.

Advisors Alliance

Finance Intern

During my internship I conducted research on health and financial insurance data, developing financial models for potential insurance plans. Additionally, I crafted a life and finance insurance plan and formulated an effective financial strategy that led to customer acquisition and resulted in a successful sale.
